answers.answer: You are supposed to have it between 24-28 weeks I would call and ask about it
I just got my test done yesterday. I'm 28 weeks and 4 days. I would call to schedule that appointment as soon as possible.
I'm doing mine now, I'm 27wks, they put a rush on it because they didn't want me to pass 28wks before having it done. Strange they haven't mentioned it, id definitely call.
I had mine at 30 weeks, just mention it at your next appointment :)

question: When do they test you for diabetes?Im 28 week and they havent said anything to me about it.
title: diabetes test
